name: DevOps engineer / Automation engineer (Jenkins, Python)
description:
Huawei is a leading global provider of smart devices and information communications technology infrastructure. We provide integrated solutions in smart devices, telecom networks, IT and cloud services. At present, we are looking for talents who will join us and contribute innovative ideas for our products and solutions. The most of our jobs suppose a lot of research, searching for state-of-art methods/algorithms.

Responsibilities:

  • Manage and operate CI/CD activities;
  • Support and development of Software deployment/updates using Ansible;
  • Building and administering containers using tools such as Docker, Kubernetes;
  • Develop automated tests, setup and support monitoring system.

Requirements:

  • Education: Bachelor's degree or higher;
  • Experienced with Linux;
  • Experienced in working with CI/CD solutions (Jenkins, Gitlab);
  • Programming skills in Python, Groovy, bash;
  • English: Intermediate or higher.

Conditions:

  • Opportunity to build the product that will be used by millions of people around the world;
  • Attractive compensation package + bonuses;
  • Medical insurance with dental care included and travel insurance;
  • Opportunity for professional growth and career development;
  • Friendly team, interesting projects, opportunity for business trips.
  • You can work in our office in Moscow (m.Smolenskaya) or in the St. Petersburg office (m.Zvenigorodskaya).

Key Skills:

Python, Linux, Shell Scripting, Docker, CI, Jenkins, Ansible
